gw.api.util

Class FXRateUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.util.FXRateUtil

  • public class FXRateUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines utility methods and classes for converting monetary amounts from one currency to another.
    Author:
    jwong

      • convertAmount

        public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount convertFrom,
                                           Currency convertTo)
        Convert a monetary amount to another in the specified currency.
        Parameters:
        convertFrom - The monetary amount to convert.
        convertTo - The currency to which the amount is to be converted.
        Returns:
        The converted monetary amount in the new currency.

      • convertAmount

        public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount convertFrom,
                                           Currency convertTo,
                                           FXRateMarket usingMarket)
        Convert a monetary amount to another in the specified currency using the specified market to obtain the most recent conversion rate.
        Parameters:
        convertFrom - The monetary amount to convert.
        convertTo - The currency to which the amount is to be converted.
        usingMarket - The market from which to obtain the conversion rate.
        Returns:
        The converted monetary amount in the new currency.

      • convertAmount

        public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount convertFrom,
                                           Currency convertTo,
                                           java.util.Date marketTime)
        Convert a monetary amount to another in the specified currency with the specified effective time from the default market.
        Parameters:
        convertFrom - The monetary amount to convert.
        convertTo - The currency to which the amount is to be converted.
        marketTime - The time for which to obtain the conversion rate.
        Returns:
        The converted monetary amount in the new currency.

      • convertAmount

        public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount convertFrom,
                                           Currency convertTo,
                                           java.util.Date marketTime,
                                           FXRateMarket usingMarket)
        Convert a monetary amount to another in the specified currency using the specified market to obtain the most recent conversion rate.
        Parameters:
        convertFrom - The monetary amount to convert.
        convertTo - The currency to which the amount is to be converted.
        marketTime - The time for which to obtain the conversion rate.
        usingMarket - The market from which to obtain the conversion rate.
        Returns:
        The converted monetary amount in the new currency.

      • convertAmount

        public static MonetaryAmount convertAmount(MonetaryAmount convertFrom,
                                           FXRate fxRate)
        Convert a monetary amount to another using the specified foreign exchange rate.
        Parameters:
        convertFrom - The monetary amount to be converted.
        fxRate - The foreign exchange rate to be used to convert the amount.
        Returns:
        The converted monetary amount in the new currency.

      • makeContextBuilder

        public static FXRateContextImpl.Builder makeContextBuilder(Currency fromCurrency,
                                                           Currency toCurrency)
        Return a new foreign exchange rate context builder between the specified currencies.
        Parameters:
        fromCurrency - The currency from which to convert using a rate.
        toCurrency - The currency to which to convert using a rate.
        Returns:
        A foreign exchange rate context builder.
